name: Garfield Kart
synopsis: Join Garfield and his friends in the funniest fast and furry-ious game! • 16 different circuits withstunning 3D environments from the world of Garfield • 8 characters (Garfield, Odie, Jon, Nermal, Arlene, Liz, Harry and Squeak) • Use your driving skills (skids, mini jumps, shortcuts) • 8 bonuses for some crazy attacks and defenses
